meanings.sent1: The westerlies brought cool air from the west.
meanings.sent2: The sailors relied on the westerlies to guide their ship.
meanings.sent3: The picnic almost flew away with the strong westerlies!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared on the westerlies of hope.
meanings.sent5: The westerlies whispered secrets of distant lands.

meanings.definition: A belt of prevailing westerly winds in the mid-latitudes of the Earth.
meanings.sent1: The westerlies are known for their consistency in the mid-latitudes.
meanings.sent2: Travelers plan their routes to take advantage of the westerlies.
meanings.sent3: The kite danced gracefully in the westerlies above.
meanings.sent4: In the westerlies of change, she found her true direction.
meanings.sent5: The westerlies painted the sky with hues of the setting sun.
